name: NieR Automata: 5B & 12S Story
description:
5B & 12S Story is an Interactive story which takes place in the same universe as NieR Automata, in a different location and with different characters.

We made this at first for an English exercise and we decide to make more than a simple story where we make choices. I love NieR series so it pushed me to do more by adding music, inventory, map and life system. It's a short game with some endings, but it was fun to do with few elements.

Write and test by:
Maxence Rerat - https://kero-san.itch.io/
Alexis Martelli - https://minosu2a.itch.io/

If you find a strange code, some browsers corrupt it.
Here is the correct code :
--. --- .-.. .. .- - ....   .- .-- .- -.- . -.   ... --- --- -.

(Decode it only if you find it, it's not that hard :D)
